titleStmt.title: A sermon preached in St. Peter's Westminster on Sunday, Jan. 6, 1660 at the consecration of the Right Reverend Fathers in God, Gilbert, Lord Bishop of Bristoll, Edward, Lord Bishop of Norwich, Nicholas, Lord Bishop of Hereford, William, Lord Bishop of Glocester by Richard Allestry ...
titleStmt.author: Allestree, Richard, 1619-1681.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Jo. Martin, Ja. Allestry, and Tho. Dicas ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
